dao.name: QRY_ROOM_RF
dao.statement: SELECT athena_id, hotel_cod, room_typ, room_nam, room_sna, room_qnt, ins_dat, ins_usr, upd_dat, upd_usr FROM room_rf WHERE trim(athena_id) = trim(:athena_id) and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod)

dao.name: QRY_ROOM_RF_DELETE
dao.statement: select count(*) from rvrmcod_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and room_typ = :room_typ and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod)

dao.name: QRY_ROOM_RF_ROOM_TYP
dao.statement: select DISTINCT rvrm.room_typ value, rtrim(rvrm.room_typ) || ':' || rtrim(rm.room_nam) display from room_rf rm INNER JOIN RVRMCOD_RF rvrm on rvrm.ROOM_TYP = RM.ROOM_TYP where rvrm.athena_id = trim(:athena_id) and trim(rvrm.hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod)

dao.name: QRY_SERVICE_RF_ITEM_NOS
dao.statement: select item_nos value,rtrim(item_nos) || ':' || rtrim(item_sna) display from service_rf where athena_id = :athena_id and trim(hotel_cod) = trim(:hotel_cod) and serv_typ = '07'

dao.name: QRY_SERVICE_RF_RENT_COD
